description: Manami invites Kyousuke over to her house to try out some sweets made by her family`s shop for a Halloween event. Her family consider these childhood friends kind of a married couple already, and Manami`s grandpa tricks them into sharing the same room that night.

titles.title: Mon amie d`enfance ne peut pas être aussi mignonne
Ore no Osananajimi ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Childhood Friend Can Be This Cute
俺の幼馴染がこんなに可愛いわけがない
